cgcloud__Product_Condition__c.name: cgcloud__Product_Condition__c
cgcloud__Product_Condition__c.description: This object uses product-specific conditions. For example, specifying product prices that are relevant for simple order value calculation.

cgcloud__Price_List_Type__c.description: Price list type for wholesaler or direct customer.

cgcloud__Price_Type__c.description: Price type for factory or consumer.

cgcloud__Product__c.description: Reference to the Product for which the product condition is defined.

cgcloud__Record_Link__c.description: Link to the detail page of the Product Condition related list record.

cgcloud__Valid_From__c.description: Day from which the Condition becomes valid for the Product.

cgcloud__Valid_Thru__c.description: Day until which the Condition is valid for the Product.
